::Slayer::

Slayer nods, his scanners locking onto the batprobes. "We'll wait 
till they're totaly gone, then we'll head back home."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Bat-Probes::
> 
> They noticed that they had seen them. so that they moved far of 
them. 
> But they had taken their energy-signature before dessapear.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Ignatius uses his many different types of vision to scan for 
> hostiles. "It
> > looks like they're giving up." He says watching thier 
concentration 
> on
> > Thyphon. "We got a few probes that might be a problem but all 
> lifesigns have
> > stopped chasing us."
